788940.name: Xara Designer Pro X 15 Steam Edition
788940.description:
Xara Designer Pro X 15 is a complete software solution that enables you to create websites and graphics, edit photos and design layouts for print products all in the same program. Choose from a wide range of stylish templates and a massive photo selection.

The most important features:

  • Over 3,000 design elements
  • Over 1 million archive photos & illustrations
  • Over 200 print layouts for business cards, flyers, etc.
  • Over 390 photo filters & effects
  • More than 240 website templates
  • Over 70 social media elements
  • Over 230 designs for presentations

Perfect for social media


New templates
Nine social media templates are included for Instagram, Twitter & Facebook. Not only do they look great, they're automatically adjustable in terms of size.
Magic Resize
Modify a Facebook post into a post for other platforms such as Instagram or Twitter. Magic Resize lets you scale text and images to the perfect size.

Breathtaking websites – no programming experience required


Over 240 templates
With 240 website templates, you're sure to find the perfect one no matter the theme of your website. All elements are 100% customizable.
Responsive web design
Your website looks great on any end device, even on smartphones and tablets. It's easy and no programming knowledge is required.

Image editing & graphic design


Simple and advanced image optimization
Adjust brightness, contrast, color and saturation in your images in a few clicks or edit the tone curves in your photos.
Draw vector graphics
Powerful drawing tools allow you to draw lines, shapes, and curves using vectors and adjust scale without loss of quality for pictures that look sharp right down to the finest detail.

Desktop publishing: Layout & typography


Advanced text editing
Produce professional, error-free documents thanks to the multilingual spellchecker and ligature support.Add a creative touch to text with effects such as transparency or fill.
Professional desktop publishing
With Xara Designer Pro X 15 you can easily create multipage publications such as brochures, fliers, newspapers and business cards.
Comprehensive format support
Xara Designer Pro X 15 supports all standard formats and you can even edit PDF files. It's particularly useful for last minute changes to a document.

Important information
  • The Steam version of Xara Designer Pro X 15 does not include web hosting.
  • The offer includes 1 full year of access to the Online Content Catalog, where you can access all the latest templates, photos, filters and more. All items from the Online Content Catalog can be downloaded during the 1 year offer period.
